column3:
(Dibrugarh East - A. In order to lessen the water logging problem a total of 8 Nos of Dewatering pump is under operating at places like
1. Phoolbagan pump
2. Near DMC pump
3. Graham Bazar tinikunia pump
4. Addl. Chief Eng. Colony pump (WRD )
5. Water resource mechanical office pump
6. Garbage dumpyard pump at Maijan
7. Thakurbari pump at Maijan
8. New Gaon pump near maijan.
B. We are also collecting population affected families data to provide GR.
C. To minimize the water logging problem of urban areas DMC and PWD continuously excavating the Garbage and silt deposition
which blocking the flow of drain water.)
